name: WBTR
detailed_description:
Welcome Back To Reality is a multiplayer first-person sandbox game, set in a futuristic environment with great emphasis on community-created content.

WBTR is designed to be as moddable as possible and allow beginners to not only create their own Maps but also Gamemodes.

The base game comes with 4 core gamemodes:

- Free For All
- Gungame
- Capture the Flag
- Zone Control

The game uses the Source 2007 Engine map format .bsp.
Assets can be imported and used in your created maps. All assets that come with the game are free to use. Functionality can be added via Lua scripts.

You can play classic maps from all Source games or create your own using the Valve Hammer Editor!
You can manage all of your self-made assets for levels using the integrated Resource Manager! All assets are being synchronized with everyone playing on the same server and can be accessed using the Sandbox Menu.

WBTR is multiplayer oriented, so everything is optimized with networking in mind.

The core game features a full-fledged True First Person Controller with IK and weapon handling.
Every event is physics-based so the interaction of objects is as realistic as possible.

short_description: WBTR is a sandbox game set in a futuristic environment, created to make your dreams come true! Play online with your friends and create huge skyscrapers, destroy some cars or let rainbow kitten fly across your screen! The choice is yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron / AMD A9
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.0 compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Performance depends on the power required by installed mods
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.0 compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Performance depends on the power required by installed mods
